title: Postman (software)
extract: Postman is an API platform for developers. The company is headquartered in San Francisco and maintains an office in Bangalore, where it was founded. As of February 2023, Postman reports having more than 30 million registered users and 75,000 open APIs, which it says constitutes the world's largest public API hub.
extract_html: Postman is an API platform for developers. The company is headquartered in San Francisco and maintains an office in Bangalore, where it was founded.
